org.etourdot.xincproc.xinclude.sax

Class XIncludeContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.etourdot.xincproc.xinclude.sax.XIncludeContext

  • public class XIncludeContext
extends Object
    This class represents the context in which the XIncProcXIncludeFilter is executed. It stores some informations abouts base uri, language, stack of xinclude or fallback elements ...
